 Initializes a newly allocated CPTXYGraph object with the provided frame rectangle and scale types.

Detailed Description

A graph using a cartesian (X-Y) plot space.

Member Function Documentation

id CPTXYGraph::initWithFrame:xScaleType:yScaleType: ( CGRect  newFrame,
[xScaleType] CPTScaleType  newXScaleType,
[yScaleType] CPTScaleType  newYScaleType 
) [virtual]

Initializes a newly allocated CPTXYGraph object with the provided frame rectangle and scale types.

This is the designated initializer.

Parameters:
newFrameThe frame rectangle.
newXScaleTypeThe scale type for the x-axis.
newYScaleTypeThe scale type for the y-axis.
Returns:
The initialized CPTXYGraph object.
